mapper.select: select sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID as 'companySourceId', s.NAME as 'sourceName', PRICE as 'sourcePrice', COALESCE((SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM SOURCE_WAREHOUSE sw WHERE sw.SOURCE_PRICE_ID = sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID), 0) AS totalQuantity from SOURCE_PRICE sp join SOURCE s ON s.source_id = sp.source_id join PRODUCT_COMPANY pc ON pc.product_company_id = sp.product_company_id where pc.NAME = #{companyName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOURCE_PRICE (SOURCE_PRICE_ID, PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID, SOURCE_ID, PRICE) VALUES (UUID(), #{companyId}, #{sourceId}, #{sourcePrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE SOURCE_PRICE SET price = #{sourcePrice} WHERE source_price_id = #{companySourceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOURCE_PRICE_HISTORY (SOURCE_PRICE_HISTORY_ID, SOURCE_PRICE_ID, OLD_PRICE, NEW_PRICE, CHANGE_DATE) VALUES (UUID(), #{companySourceId}, #{oldPrice}, #{sourcePrice}, NOW())
INSERT into SOURCE_WAREHOUSE (SOURCE_WAREHOUSE_ID, QUANTITY, PRODUCE_DATE, SOURCE_PRICE_ID) VALUES (UUID(), #{sourceQuantity}, NOW(), #{sourcePriceId})
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by sw.produce_date asc) AS rowNum, sw.source_warehouse_id as sourceWarehouseId, sw.QUANTITY as sourceQuantity, DATE_FORMAT(sw.produce_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%m') as produceDate, s.name as sourceName, CASE WHEN sw.QUANTITY > 0 THEN '입고' ELSE '출고' END as type FROM SOURCE_WAREHOUSE sw JOIN SOURCE_PRICE sp on sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID = sw.SOURCE_PRICE_ID JOIN SOURCE s on s.SOURCE_ID = sp.SOURCE_ID JOIN PRODUCT_COMPANY pc ON pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID WHERE pc.NAME = #{companyName}
mapper.update: update PRODUCT_ORDER set STATUS_ID = #{orderStatus} where PRODUCT_ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT_ORDER_LOG (PRODUCT_ORDER_LOG_ID, PRODUCT_ORDER_ID, STATUS_ID, PRODUCT_ORDER_DATE) VALUES (UUID(), #{orderId}, #{orderStatus}, NOW())
INSERT into SOURCE_WAREHOUSE (SOURCE_WAREHOUSE_ID, QUANTITY, PRODUCE_DATE, SOURCE_PRICE_ID) VALUES (UUID(), -#{sourceQuantity}, NOW(), #{sourcePriceId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.SOURCE_ID as 'sourceId', s.NAME as 'sourceName' FROM SOURCE s WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SOURCE_PRICE sp JOIN PRODUCT_COMPANY pc ON sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID WHERE sp.SOURCE_ID = s.SOURCE_ID AND pc.NAME = #{companyName} )
SELECT SOURCE_ID FROM SOURCE WHERE NAME = #{sourceName}
select product_company_id from PRODUCT_COMPANY where NAME = #{companyName}
select SUM(quantity) from SOURCE_WAREHOUSE WHERE SOURCE_PRICE_ID = #{sourcePriceId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SOURCE_PRICE sp JOIN SOURCE s on sp.SOURCE_ID = s.SOURCE_ID JOIN PRODUCT_COMPANY pc on pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID WHERE pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} and (s.SOURCE_ID = #{sourceId} or s.NAME = #{sourceName})
SELECT s.NAME as sourceName FROM SOURCE_PRICE sp JOIN PRODUCT_COMPANY pc on sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID JOIN SOURCE s on sp.SOURCE_ID = s.SOURCE_ID where pc.NAME = #{companyName}

SELECT SUM(quantity) as sourceQuantity, s.NAME as sourceName FROM SOURCE_WAREHOUSE sw join SOURCE_PRICE sp on sw.SOURCE_PRICE_ID = sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID join SOURCE s on s.SOURCE_ID = sp.SOURCE_ID join PRODUCT_COMPANY pc on pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID WHERE pc.NAME = #{companyName} GROUP BY sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID -- ORDER BY sourceQuantity DESC -- LIMIT 20

SELECT s.NAME as sourceName, SUM(sw.QUANTITY) as sales FROM SOURCE_WAREHOUSE sw JOIN SOURCE_PRICE sp on sw.SOURCE_PRICE_ID = sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID join SOURCE s on s.SOURCE_ID = sp.SOURCE_ID join PRODUCT_COMPANY pc on pc.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID = sp.PRODUCT_COMPANY_ID WHERE pc.NAME = #{companyName} and sw.quantity < 0
and sw.PRODUCE_DATE LIKE CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()), '-', LPAD(#{orderChartMonthOption}, 2, '0'), '%')
group by sp.SOURCE_PRICE_ID
